description: Detects DCShadow via create new SPN Author: Ilyas Ochkov, oscd.community, Chakib Gzenayi (@Chak092), Hosni Mribah. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Possible DC Shadow
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND ((winlog.event_id:"4742" AND winlog.event_data.ServicePrincipalNames:*GC\/*) OR (winlog.event_id:"5136" AND winlog.event_data.AttributeLDAPDisplayName:"servicePrincipalName" AND AttributeValue:GC\/*)))
